name: VVVVV
description:
VVVVV is a colorful, dynamic platformer action with puzzle elements, made in retro style. You have to go through many obstacles, solving various puzzles. A considerable arsenal of weapons will come to your aid, which will turn the enemy into minced meat. Use the acrobatic abilities of the protagonist to deftly and quickly overcome deadly traps, climb walls, and also find a special artifact that will allow you to change the gravity vector and gain power over the air! Levels tend to get harder and harder, so be careful. And in no case do not make a donation to the demonic altar — it will not end in good.

Features:
• Many difficult and dangerous levels
• Deadly traps at every turn
• Dominate Gravity
• Large selection of weapons and items
• Dynamic battles and boss battles
• Colorful minimalistic graphics in retro style
